text: Heiko Josef Maas (born 19 September 1966) is a German politician. He was the Minister of Foreign Affairs in the cabinet of Angela Merkel, and took office on 14 March 2018. He served as Federal Minister of Justice and Consumer Protection from 17 December 2013 to 14 March 2018. He is a member of the Social Democratic Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Heiko Maas at wahl.de Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Politicians from Saarland Category:Justice ministers of Germany Category:Foreign ministers of Germany
title: Heiko Maas
